model_details.description: The model is a semantic parser trained on WikiTableQuestions.
model_details.short_description: The model is a semantic parser trained on WikiTableQuestions.

paper.title: Iterative Search for Weakly Supervised Semantic Parsing

metrics.model_performance_measures:
1. `lf_retrieval_acc`; the percentage of the time that our best output action sequence is in the set of action sequences provided by offline search.
2. `denotation_acc`; the percentage of examples where we get the correct denotation.
3. `lf_percent`; the percentage of time that decoding actually produces a finished logical form

dataset.name: WikiTableQuestions
dataset.notes: Please download the data from the url provided.
